Title: Children of the Fall
Writer: Daniella Danziger, Eitan Gafny (story), Eitan Gafny, Eitan Gafny
Actors: Noa Maiman, Aki Avni, Yafit Shalev, Iftach Ophir
Plot: Rachel Strode, a young immigrant with a dark secret in her past, comes to Israel in the Fall of 1973 to volunteer in a Kibbutz and then to convert to Judaism. Soon, she realizes that the ...
